Variability and centrality measurements
players wage data
```{r}
players = c(40000,18000,12000,250000,30000,140000,300000,40000,800000)
```
Average
```{r}
mean(players)
```
median
```{r}

```
quartiles
```{r}
quartis  = quantile(players)
quartis
```
